    • isValidSubtraction

      public boolean isValidSubtraction​(int runes)
      checks if you can subtract runes will return a false if the subtraction goes under 0 meaning you cant spend money you don't have
      Parameters:
      runes - Runes that are to be removed from the wallet
      Returns:
      validity that specifies weather the subtraction is greater or equal to 0
